description:
An open-source alternative to Claude Cowork, powered by OpenCode

OpenWork is an extensible, open-source “Claude Work” style system for knowledge workers.
It’s a native desktop app that runs OpenCode under the hood, but presents it as a clean, guided workflow:
- pick a workspace
- start a run
- watch progress + plan updates
- approve permissions when needed
- reuse what works (templates + skills)
The goal: make “agentic work” feel like a product, not a terminal.
Highlights
- Improved session performance by windowing long chat history so large conversations stay responsive.
- Updated desktop and package versions to 0.11.80 for a coordinated release.
Fixes & polish
- Kept version metadata aligned across app, desktop, orchestrator, server, and opencode-router packages.
- Refreshed lockfiles and release artifacts for consistent installs.
Packaging / ops
- Included release screenshot artifact for the long-session windowing change.
